about_the_game:
Sit a spell, stranger! Come to the little town of Seabreeze for a visual novel filled with love, community, and just a hint of mystery to pull it all together!


Bet you’re just itching to meet everyone. We have a whole host of fun characters, among them are about 11 women, all of differing personalities, all brought to life through hand-drawn, lovingly made, anime-inspired art! Come meet them and the rest of the cast as the story comes together.



How does one find these girls? Don’t think too hard about it. Seabreeze ain’t the kind of town that will breathe down your neck to make you find everything. The story you get here is straightforward and simple. If you wanna find the girls, you’ll find them easily enough if you put your ear to the ground. Beyond them, there are quite a fair bit of locations for you to explore. Just keep your nose to the ground though, you never know who or what you might find in a little town like this.


Ah, you’re wondering more about the ladies here eh? Well, they’re a kindly sort. Most love to meet new people, and each one comes with an interesting host of quirks and needs. Some might help you get jobs, others will need things from you, but all of them are looking for something in life…and who knows, that something might just be you. Careful though…who knows what secrets these girls might be keeping about themselves…or the town itself.

So come along, meet them…and who knows, someone might get a little lucky, eh?




Featuring:

  • 11 unique, charming and kinky ladies
  • Very Lite Survival Mechanics!
  • Minigames!
  • Make decisions about the relationships you make
  • Become part of the local community and help the townsfolk!
  • Solve the mystery plaguing the town!

content_descriptors.notes: Explicit sexual visuals and dialogue among a casual setting. The full version will include ropeplay, sexual roleplay, religious themes, degradation, breeding, hypnotism, the use of toys and a few other kinks.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: Dual Core or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.6 or higher
  • Processor: Dual Core or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GT 750 or better, AMD equivalent
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: Kindvixens

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10, 11
  • Processor: Dual Core or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GT 750 or better, AMD equivalent
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: There are places for you, all around, in this world and in another’s arms. Find one in the mysterious town of Seabreeze in this visual novel about the quaint, mysterious little town. Searching about, one might find love, community...and deeper secrets hidden beneath.
